name: Too Much Stuff!
description:
Play as John, a Epiplaphobe (fear of furniture) invited to a party at a hoarder's estate. Navigate room after room full of cluttered objects and get to the bathroom in time, without having John suffer a horrible, agonizing, painful, death at the hands of the objects.

Made for Trijam in around 4 hours

Note: there are a few issues with WebGL physics, which is why objects sometimes get stuck in walls. As far as I know, there is no easy fix for this, and the different solutions I tried only made it worse.
